name: get_job_info
description: Get detailed information about a Jenkins job including parameters and requirements. Use this to understand what parameters a job needs before executing it. Does not execute the job.

job_name.description: Name of the Jenkins job to get information about (defaults to docker-scan)

name: list_jobs
description: List all Jenkins jobs supported by this agent with their parameters and descriptions. Use when users ask 'what jobs are available?' or need to see all supported Jenkins operations.

name: trigger_job
description: Execute any supported Jenkins job with specified parameters. CRITICAL: Only executes when confirmed=true. Use for job execution ONLY after user confirmation.

job_name.description: Name of the Jenkins job to trigger (e.g., 'docker-scan', 'Pipeline central-release-promotion')

job_parameters.description: JSON object containing job-specific parameters. Each job has different required and optional parameters.

confirmed.description: REQUIRED: Must be 'true' to execute the job. Set to 'true' ONLY after user explicitly confirms job execution. Never set to 'true' without user confirmation. Accepts: 'true', 'false', true, false.

name: test_connection
description: Test connection to Jenkins server. Use only when explicitly asked to test connectivity or troubleshoot connection issues.
